title: I get my preferred role so much less with this new champ select, not cool
body: I go Mid first and Support second, and yes, none of you need to explain why I keep getting Support and rarely Mid, the need for Supports are SO much higher. I personally, LOVE the new champion select but I wish there was an option to only queue up with one role or just have a more balanced role distribution for each respective player.

replies.body: same. I have tried to play jungle the past 7 games (at least) and it's impossible!!!
